假設你香港做嘢，好多 data scientist 其實只係 data analyst 換個名，然後做埋一般 It9 同 data engineer 嘅範疇。每日大部份時間都係水機換水, 換燈膽, database, BI tools, EDA, Excel

Modeling 嘅時間 0.000001% 時間都冇，有都可能只係 Excel 㩒兩下出 ANOVA table 就完或者 SPSS 摷返 Clustering 粒制，反正搞到天花龍鳳老細都唔明。所以其實 data science 呢一行只係 market research + data analyst + it 9 混合而成，說不上甚麼專業

難聽啲講，Data scientist 真係一個 bootcamp 就轉到嘅工作黎

replies.msg:
FAANG都有主要做market research喺product team入面嘅data scientist 做嘅嘢大多就係你所講說不上什麼專業嘅嘢 而好多人都係有phd/ technical background出身
另外ds bootcamp其實都係搵笨嘅 好多人讀完出嚟之後都係轉唔到行 或者去咗啲細公司做data打雜
同software engineering唔同 SE(web/app)本身啲嘢唔難 有學過就識同埋demand夠大 所以啲bootcamp先叫做有啲用 而ds其實諗吓都知 有咁多stat/cs又或者係有postgrad degree嘅人想去做data 同SE相比可以話係high supply of highly skilled grads另外人頭嘅需求唔係話太大
所以其實最後啲大公司點都一定係揀咗呢啲人先㗎啦 幾時先輪到bootcamp嗰啲
好多時都係講supply/ demand 公司有得揀嘅話點都係請勁啲嗰個 即使最後可能都係做啲唔係太複雜嘅嘢

另一個角度 其實基本數據處理係通用 你咩行業都好 識左無壞 一生受用

pivot table 就係pivot table, 唔會因為你用左python 黎做會勁d

當你發覺excel 處理唔到你既需求 你好自然就去搵第二隻tool

btw 最近發覺d 銀行/account 都叫人去學python , d 老細諗乜

quote.msg:
Data science ? CS+ stat+ math
學左下面個d先好出嚟
CS: C++, data structure, python, linked list, vector, algorithm, DBMS, MySQL
Stat: basics statistics and probability, hypothesis testing, confidence interval, log function, transformation of distribution, central limit theorem, statistical interference, time series, machine learning, ggplot, MSE, MSS, MSR, R
Math: Basic Calculus, limits, linear algebra, vector and matrices, differences and differential equation, matlab, scientific computing, numerical analysis.
Optional: financial calculus

我覺得你cs同stat有d充字數feel，data structure都包埋Linked list同vector啦講真，DBMS點會唔學SQL，d大學course咁舊
其次你stat list嘅content 80%（唔計最後個幾個terms）都係intro stat嘢黎。得math叫左似樣小小

Maths 都唔似樣...

"Math: Basic Calculus, limits, linear algebra, vector and matrices, differences and differential equation, matlab, scientific computing, numerical analysis.
Optional: financial calculus"

1. Financial calculus 做既 SDE/Stochatic processes 其實唔關 data science 事
2. Numerical analysis 係 scientific computing 既 branch 黎. Scientific computing 其實都冇用, 因為主要講 Matrix, Optimization 同 PDE computation methods
3. Difference equation 好少自己成科
4. Differential equations 其實都係冇用, 幾可 data science 會 solve 一條 differential equations?
5. vector and matrices 只係 linear algebra

認真, 唔洗數學... 都唔知係咪真係識香港市場
